text: Jiřina Jirásková (February 17, 1931 - January 7, 2013) was a Czechoslovak actress who is known for her roles in Caesar and Cleopatra, Richard III, The Cherry Orchard, and The Full Monty. Jirásková was born on February 17, 1931 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She was married for two years to Jiří Pleskot until they divorced. Then she spent 27 years with Zdeněk Podskalský until her death. She had no children. Jirásková died on January 7, 2013 in Prague, Czech Republic from natural causes, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Czechoslovak people Category:Entertainers from Prague Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech stage actors Category:Czech television actors
title: Jiřina Jirásková
